file_content.text: I take it you're the folks my friend Shyrack suggested watching out for.
I take it you're the one my friend Shyrack suggested watching out for.
Tsk. I'm hearing about angry words being exchanged between House Thul and House Baliss. So sad when friends fall out, ain't it?
With that in mind--here. Now, need to get that little surprise planned for House Thul. If you'll excuse me?
Thul and Baliss won't be having any banquets together for a while. Good work.
